Yang Hyong Sop Meets German Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Friedrich Ludwig Loehr, German ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
